entry.title: Mariana Aramburu, Marketing Assistant & Social Media
entry.content:

Originally from Mexico city she has been living here in Canada for the last 4 years working on her degree at Capilano University. Always something clever to say and able to perfectly recite every word of the Lord of the Rings movies :P

 

Favorite Food: Persian cuisine

Favorite Quote: “What we have to decide is what to do with the time that has been given to us.” – Gandalf the Grey

entry.title: Zan Wong , Office Manager & Inside Sales -RETIRED
entry.content:

Originally from Hong Kong, Zan spends much of her time with her family and enjoys going to classic rock concerts with her husband and lately, planning her son’s wedding. Zan retired from her work with Breizh on September 1st, 2016.

entry.title: Taylor Opheim, Chief Executive Officer
entry.content:
Starting in 2012 Taylor took on the position of Business Developer with (at the time) Breizh Salon Services, his family's 30 year old business. With this position it has been his responsibility to work closely with the staff to improve all aspects of the business following the recession crisis and re-stabilize and restructure a company that was not "ahead of the curve" as they say.

Since starting with the company, he has worked closely with the President, Vice-President, staff, clients and suppliers to create (better) strategies in regards to finance, marketing, operations, sales and has also been charged with creating an online, ecommerce presence, sales and building our team.

Now with his increasing involvement in the intimate pieces of the company's budgeting and strategy he became the Director of Business Development, fostering relationships with all stakeholders and sourcing new areas of business for the company.

 


Favourite Food: Cupcakes & Black Coffee

Favourite Quote: “We are born into life as a blank canvas. What’s interesting is that we are also the artist.”

Languages: English, French and a tiny bit of many others :P

entry.title: Corinne Riou, Master Esthetician & Vice-President of Education
entry.content:

 Beyond the office Corinne spends her time walking the dog, volunteering as a Girl Guides pack leader and spending time up at their lake cottage.

 

 

 

 

Favorite Food: Ferrero Rocher

Favorite Quote: “Education is key”

entry.title: Jean Riou, Founder, Advisor and Chief Accounting Officer
entry.content:
Coming from a business background in the late 50s Paris, Jean moved to Vancouver BC in 1964 to start out on an adventure. Already married and with child, this adventure would lead him to becoming the President of the Francophone Cultural Federation in the early and late 1970s where he was able to create the entire BC curriculum for French education. Following this he became a founding member of the BC Children’s Festival that is still happening today.

During this time he also founded the first wholesale distributor of spa, salon and esthetics beauty supplies in Western Canada: Breizh Skincare Supply (now of course though we’re Breizh Esthetics & Salon Supply).


He is still very much an active member of the business and  his community, never a day where he’s not up at 5am for his daily jog.

 

Favorite Food: Oysters

Favorite quote: “Just do it”

Languages: French, English
